The Kentwood Difference

The Smart Advantage Behind Our Multiplex Home

Built on Proven Excellence

Kentwood Home is an award-winning team with high-energy design-driven individuals. We bring our knowledge and early insight into our projects. Focusing on craft, efficiency, and aesthetics, each home is designed with high standards of design and durability. Our houses are made with modern, energy-efficient materials and appliances to reduce environmental impact and lower utility costs. We are dedicated to providing our homeowners with a house they can be proud of, with a focus on quality, value, and customer satisfaction.

Building high-quality, sustainable communities that harmonize with their surroundings.
